name: Tortoises with top hats
description:
Ran out of time as always,  so it is quite short, but at least I made something.

Controls: A and D - Movement, Space - Jump,  R- Restart

If you lose all your lives, just restart

All assets made by me. The player character was made for a previous game jam.

- No real tortoises were harmed in the making of this game -
